title: 9 Easy Ways to Make a PDF: Free & Online

steps.title: Use the free built-in tools with Mac to create PDFs.
steps.content: Use the free built-in tools with Mac to create PDFs. Click to select the files you want to combine into a PDF in Finder or on your desktop. Control-click the files and choose Quick Actions > Create PDF . [1] X Research source

steps.title: You can easily create a PDF with or without a subscription.
steps.content: You can easily create a PDF with or without a subscription. In the bar at the very top of your screen, click + Create and you'll be prompted how to create your PDF. If you pay for Adobe Acrobat Pro, you'll see a "Create a PDF" option near the top as well. Click either of those buttons and you'll get more creation options, like if you want to make the PDF out of a single file, multiple files, from your scanner, or a webpage, if the information is saved in your clipboard, or if you want to create the PDF starting from scratch (a blank document). You can create a PDF from a blank document (starting from scratch) even if you don't pay for a subscription!

steps.title: Create a file in any Google document style and save it as a PDF!
steps.content: Create a file in any Google document style and save it as a PDF! The best part about this is you can use anything, like Google Slides , Google Docs , or Google Sheets . Once you finish creating your document, go to File > Download > PDF document . [2] X Research source

steps.title: Create a PDF for free.
steps.content: Create a PDF for free. Go here: https://www.canva.com/create/pdf-maker/ and click Make a PDF . Sign in if prompted and you'll be able to create the document online and then download the PDF to your local storage! Download the PDF by clicking Share > Download and make sure the "File type" is "PDF Standard", then click Download .

steps.title: Make a PDF online for free.
steps.content: Make a PDF online for free. Go to https://tools.pdf24.org/en/create-pdf and click how to create your PDF. For example, if you have an image that you want to convert to PDF, click Images to PDF . Or if you have a physical document that you want to turn into a PDF, click Create PDF with a camera . You can also use this site on iPhone, iPad, and Android, meaning you can make PDFs while you're mobile.

steps.title: Convert files to PDF online for free.
steps.content: Convert files to PDF online for free. Go to https://smallpdf.com/pdf-converter and choose the file you want to make into a PDF. You can delete or rearrange pages before you download the document. There's a limit to how many documents you can download per month using the free plan, but that's unlimited when you pay for a plan.

steps.title: Upload a document and turn it into a PDF online.
steps.content: Upload a document and turn it into a PDF online. Go to https://www.docfly.com/create-pdf and click Upload File to convert a document to PDF. You can download the resulting file 3 times or pay to unlock unlimited downloads.

steps.title: Save your Word doc as a PDF for free.
steps.content: Save your Word doc as a PDF for free. Open your document in Word, go to File > Save and change the "Save as type" to "PDF." Click Save to save the file as PDF. steps.title: Turn a webpage into a PDF without downloading any software.
steps.content: Turn a webpage into a PDF without downloading any software. Navigate to the page that you want to save as a PDF, then press Ctrl + P (Windows) or âŒ˜ Cmd + P (Mac) to open the Print Menu. Select "Save as PDF" from the drop-down. If you're using Windows, you'll see this option under the "Printer" menu. You'll see the "Save as PDF" option under the "Local Destinations" heading on Macs. Click Save to save the webpage as a PDF. You'll need to repeat this process for all separate pages on the site that you want to save, like for an About Me and Contact page. Once you have separate PDFs for those, you can merge them in multiple ways.
